hero.title: Athlete Q&A on {website.name}
hero.subtitle: Have questions about becoming an athlete? Ask us anything and learn how to kickstart your athletic journey with {website.name}’s tools and community in {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1}.

becomeAthlete.title: How to Become an Athlete
becomeAthlete.description: Dreaming of becoming an athlete? {website.name} provides resources, tools, and a community to help you succeed. Submit your questions below or follow these steps to get started.

form.title: Ask Your Question
form.subtitle: Submit your question about becoming an athlete, and our team will get back to you with personalized advice.

steps.title: Join {website.name}
steps.description: Sign up for free to access our platform. Create a profile to connect with coaches and teams in your sport.

steps.title: Train with Tools
steps.description: Use our video analysis and performance tracking tools to monitor progress and improve your skills.

steps.title: Connect and Grow
steps.description: Join teams, collaborate with coaches, and engage with the global {website.name} community to advance your athletic career.

items.question: What skills do I need to become an athlete?
items.answer: Becoming an athlete requires dedication, physical fitness, and sport-specific skills. Start with a strong work ethic, train consistently, and use {website.name}’s analytics to track progress. Connect with coaches for guidance and focus on building endurance, strength, and technique.

items.question: How can {website.name} help me become an athlete?
items.answer: {website.name} offers video analysis, performance stats, and a community of coaches and athletes in {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1}. Upload your training videos, get feedback, and track your improvement to stand out in your sport.

items.question: What sports can I pursue on {website.name}?
items.answer: Our platform supports 15+ sports, including soccer, basketball, volleyball, and more. Choose your sport, join teams, and access tools tailored to your needs to excel as an athlete.

items.question: How do I find a coach or team?
items.answer: After signing up, search for teams or coaches in your sport on {website.name}. Filter by location or sport, connect directly, and start collaborating to boost your athletic journey.

items.question: Is it free to use {website.name} as an athlete?
items.answer: Yes, you can start for free with access to basic features. Upgrade to premium plans for advanced tools like ad-free video analysis and enhanced analytics.
